# Cookbook audit

Broken links in the cookbooks have been repaired to match the current `apps/` layout:

- **Favorites** now points to `apps/sites/templates/...` and `apps/locals/admin.py`. 【F:apps/docs/cookbooks/favorites.md†L14-L64】
- **Node features** references `apps/nodes/admin.py`, `apps/nodes/feature_checks.py`, and `apps/nodes/models.py`. 【F:apps/docs/cookbooks/node-features.md†L14-L92】
- **User data** links to `apps/locals/user_data.py` and the updated template locations. 【F:apps/docs/cookbooks/user-data.md†L13-L76】

No cookbooks require deletion at this time.
